title: Character - Background
contents: property | Unique: | Choose a single parental option for each character.
text | A. Parents distant due to work but supportive. No siblings, so character essentially raises themselves. [Trait: Independent]
text | B. Harried single parent, but loving household (multiple siblings). Character lost in the mix, but raised by older sister/brother. [Trait: Follower]
text | C. Parents passed away tragically, but character raised by wealthy relative in environment of abundance. [Trait: First Class Education, Spoilt]

title: Character - Background
contents: property | Unique: | Choose a single parental option for each character.
text | A. Close parental relationship (no siblings). They're supportive, attentive, and would do anything for your character. [Trait: Well-rounded]
text | B. Parents passed away, but character is raised by grandmother/grandfather, who teaches life lessons and gives them a 'quest' on their deathbed. [Motivation]
text | C. Raised by a single parent with three siblings, who instills in each child the importance of relying on family [Trait: Family Ties]
